action_items.title: Reframe experience around the role’s core outcomes
action_items.why_it_matters: Hiring managers screen for outcome-aligned evidence, not just titles.
how_to_execute: Rewrite your Summary to mirror the job’s top 3 responsibilities (only what you’ve actually done).
Move the most relevant project/experience bullets to the top of Experience.
Add measurable impact (latency, cost reduction, adoption, accuracy, revenue).

action_items.title: Close skill gaps with proof-based micro-projects
action_items.why_it_matters: If you’re missing required skills, you need evidence fast—not claims.
how_to_execute: Pick 1–2 gaps and build a small repo that demonstrates them: model evaluation
Add a short 'Projects' section with 2 bullets: what you built + what metric improved.
Link GitHub in contact links and include the repo in your cover letter.

action_items.title: Keyword-map your existing skills to the job language
action_items.why_it_matters: ATS and recruiters search by the job’s vocabulary; synonyms can hide relevance.
how_to_execute: Create a 2-column mapping: Job keyword → your equivalent experience evidence.
Update Skills section with exact job keywords (only if true).
Add 1 bullet per mapped keyword under the most relevant experience item.
